revised_title: Heritability of Migratory Activity in Blackcaps
tldr: This study examines the heritability of migratory activity in a natural blackcap bird population. The researchers found that migratory activity has a significant additive genetic component, suggesting that genetic factors play a role in controlling bird migration. The high amount of phenotypic and genetic variation found for migratory activity in this population could lead to rapid evolutionary changes in migratory habits.
